Investor_11.name: Aisha Ibrahim

My refusal demonstrates my commitment to protecting my resources and ensuring that any investment aligns with integrity and equitable profit-sharing. I prioritize fairness, especially when there may be existing conflicts such as being on a mutual blacklist, and I remain vigilant for future collaborations that uphold these values.

Trustee_11.name: Aisha Ibrahim

My capability to create a fair allocation plan has come into question, and I must take steps to regain trust by being more transparent and demonstrating my competence in successfully executing investment strategies. The cumulative effect of this rejection, along with previous instances of similar outcomes, indicates a diminishing reputation requiring significant effort to rebuild.
